location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Sir Bartle Frere

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's report on Palgrave's journey; the arrival of Hugh Roseat Gwadur and the recent crisis in the cotton market.The letter also discuses rumours that Torkee ben[Turki bin] Sedairee, the Wahabee [Wahhabi] lieutenant, has been killed and enclosing an old letter from the Governor of Fars whom Pelly intends to visit in order to discuss Persia's intentions with regards to Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas]. The letter referred to is no longer enclosed.
